verses.verse: And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> to <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and to all his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, that they should <S%H4191>slay<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>. But Jonathan, Saul's son, delighted much in David.

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H7586>Saul<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> to <S%H4191>slay<s%> <S%H8104>thee<s%>: now therefore, I pray thee, take heed to thyself in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H3427>abide<s%> in a <S%H5643>secret<s%> <S%H2244>place<s%>, and hide thyself:

and I will go <S%H3318>out<s%> and <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H3027>beside<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> where thou <S%H1696>art<s%>, and I will commune with my <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H4100>thee<s%>; and if I <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5046>aught<s%>, I will tell thee.

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> unto <S%H7586>Saul<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4428>him<s%>, Let not the king <S%H2398>sin<s%> against his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, against <S%H1732>David<s%>; because he hath not <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H4639>thee<s%>, and because his works have been to <S%H3966>thee-ward<s%> very <S%H2896>good<s%>:

for he <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H5315>life<s%> in his <S%H3709>hand<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>, and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6213>wrought<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8668>victory<s%> for all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: thou <S%H7200>sawest<s%> <S%H8055>it<s%>, and didst rejoice; wherefore then wilt thou <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>, to <S%H4191>slay<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> without a <S%H2600>cause<s%>?

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%>: and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%>, As <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, he shall <S%H518>not<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H5046>showed<s%> him all those <S%H1697>things<s%>. And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and he was in his <S%H6440>presence<s%>, as <S%H865>beforetime<s%>.

And there was <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%>: and <S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%>, and <S%H3898>fought<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and <S%H5221>slew<s%> them with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%>; and they <S%H5127>fled<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%>.

And an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was upon <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, as he <S%H3427>sat<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%> with his <S%H2595>spear<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H5059>playing<s%> with his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> even to the <S%H7023>wall<s%> with the <S%H2595>spear<s%>; but he slipped <S%H6362>away<s%> out of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H6440>presence<s%>, and he <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H2595>spear<s%> into the <S%H7023>wall<s%>: and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%>, and <S%H4422>escaped<s%> that <S%H3915>night<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, to <S%H8104>watch<s%> <S%H4191>him<s%>, and to slay him in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>: and <S%H4324>Michal<s%>, <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>, <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, saying, If thou <S%H4422>save<s%> not thy <S%H5315>life<s%> <S%H3915>to-night<s%>, <S%H4279>to-morrow<s%> thou wilt be <S%H4191>slain<s%>.
So <S%H4324>Michal<s%> <S%H3381>let<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> through the <S%H2474>window<s%>: and he <S%H3212>went<s%>, and <S%H1272>fled<s%>, and <S%H4422>escaped<s%>.

And <S%H4324>Michal<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H8655>teraphim<s%>, and <S%H7760>laid<s%> it in the <S%H4296>bed<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H3523>pillow<s%> of <S%H5795>goats<s%>' hair at the <S%H4763>head<s%> <S%H3680>thereof<s%>, and covered it with the <S%H899>clothes<s%>.
And when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, she <S%H559>said<s%>, He is <S%H2470>sick<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Bring him <S%H5927>up<s%> to me in the <S%H4296>bed<s%>, that I may slay <S%H4191>him<s%>.

And when the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%>, <S%H8655>behold<s%>, the teraphim was <S%H935>in<s%> the <S%H4296>bed<s%>, with the <S%H3523>pillow<s%> of <S%H5795>goats<s%>' hair at the head thereof.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4324>Michal<s%>, Why hast thou deceived me <S%H7411>thus<s%>, and let mine <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H7411>go<s%>, so that he is <S%H4422>escaped<s%>? And <S%H4324>Michal<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, He <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7971>me<s%>, Let me go; why should I kill <S%H4191>thee<s%>?

Now <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%>, and <S%H4422>escaped<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> to <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>, and <S%H5046>told<s%> him all that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H8050>him<s%>. And he and Samuel <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H5121>Naioth<s%>.
And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H1732>Behold<s%>, David is at <S%H5121>Naioth<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>: and when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H3862>company<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H5012>prophesying<s%>, and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> as <S%H5324>head<s%> over <S%H7307>them<s%>, the Spirit of <S%H430>God<s%> came upon the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and they also <S%H5012>prophesied<s%>.

And when it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%>, and they also <S%H5012>prophesied<s%>. And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H5012>time<s%>, and they also prophesied.

Then <S%H3212>went<s%> he also to <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H953>well<s%> that is in <S%H7906>Secu<s%>: and he <S%H7592>asked<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H375>Where<s%> are <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%>? And one <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5121>Behold<s%>, they are at Naioth in <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>.

And he <S%H3212>went<s%> thither to <S%H5121>Naioth<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>: and the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> came upon him <S%H3212>also<s%>, and he went <S%H1980>on<s%>, and <S%H5012>prophesied<s%>, until he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5121>Naioth<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>.

And he <S%H1571>also<s%> stripped <S%H6584>off<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and he also <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>, and lay <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> all that <S%H3117>day<s%> and all that <S%H3915>night<s%>. Wherefore they <S%H559>say<s%>, Is <S%H7586>Saul<s%> also among the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>?
